UI Elements¶

class src.scripts.ui.Label(x, y, colour, text_str, padding, font)¶

Label/Button UI Element

A pygame label displaying text which can be used for events.

property pos¶

get x and y position

property rect¶

get label box

render(display) → None¶

display the elements to the screen :param display: the current pygame display :type display: pygame.Surface

property text¶

get text object

property text_str¶

get text string

class src.scripts.ui.Spinner(x, y, value, font, minimum=0, maximum=1, step=1)¶

Spinner Input UI Element

A UI Integer input with arrows to increase/decrease the value by a given step amount

add_step(is_positive=True) → None¶

increase/decrease value by step :param is_positive: should the value be increased (False means decrease) :type is_positive: bool

property rect¶

get rectangle

render(display) → None¶

display the elements to the screen :param display: the current pygame display :type display: pygame.Surface :return:

set_font(new_font: pygame.font.Font) → None¶

set font

set_step(value: int) → None¶

set step amount

property value¶

get value
